title: In-Context Learning for Label-Efficient Cancer Image Classification in Oncology
details: M Shrestha, B Mandal, V Mandal, A Shrestha - arXiv preprint arXiv:2505.08798, 2025
abstract: The application of AI in oncology has been limited by its reliance on large, annotated datasets and the need for retraining models for domain-specific diagnostic tasks. Taking heed of these limitations, we investigated in-context learning as a pragmatic …
